mnd7:19.3: bhaggakaṇḍakoti → bhaggakaṇṭakoti (bj, s1-3, pts1), araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj), manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mnd7:31.3: nānābhisaṅkhāre → nānābhisaṅkhārehi (s1-3, pts1), ajjhosannā → ajjhopannā (bj, s1-3) | ajjhosānā (pts1)
mnd7:60.1: tāmaliṃ → kamaliṃ (s1-3) | tamaliṃ (pts1) | taṃmaliṃ (mr), tambapāṇiṃ → tambapaṇṇiṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1 ^mnd15#58 [Attadaṇḍasuttaniddesa]), paramayonaṃ → pinaṃ (s1-3), gacchati, vinakaṃ → allasandaṃ gacchati navakaṃ (bj) | allasandaṃ gacchati (s1-3, pts1), gacchati, mūlapadaṃ gacchati →  etthantare pāṭho syā1-3 potthakesu
mnd7:82.4: ānaṇyaṃ → āṇaṇyaṃ (aṭṭha.), kantāraddhānapakkhandā → kantāraddhānapakkhantā (bj) | kantāraddhānaṃ pakkhannā (s1-3, pts1)
